humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, two sentinel lymph nodes were examined and both were negative for metastases (0/2). Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0, which indicates no metastatic carcinoma in regional lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that two sentinel lymph nodes were examined and both were negative for carcinoma (0/2). This means that there are no metastases in the regional lymph nodes, so the N stage is N0.
